headline: Assessing Albemarle (ALB) Valuation Following Recent Share Price Gains
summary: Albemarle is in focus after a stretch of share price gains, with the stock rising 24% over the past month. Investors may be taking a second look at the company as its lithium business attracts renewed attention. See our latest analysis for Albemarle. Albemarle’s run over the past month is catching eyes, but it’s part of a larger rebound story. Momentum is clearly building, with a 24.15% 1-month share price return and year-to-date gains over 35%. Even factoring in last year’s volatility,...
